item.description: My name is Mudox. I’m an iOS developer.

item.title: My iOS Awesome List
item.description: Swift Dollar A functional tool-belt for Swift Language. Swiftz Swiftz is a Swift library for functional programming. Tool Jazzy Soulful docs for Swift & Objective-C. SwiftLint A tool to enforce Swift style and conventions. Swimat Swift source code formatter. Provide Xcode integration, very handy. Injection for Xcode Runtime Code Injection for Objective-C & Swift.

item.title: Auto Highlighting Toc
item.description: Before Everything The static site generator Hugo I used in for this site auto-generates TOC for each article. The rendered TOC html DOM structure is like: It basically scans the article body part for headings (h1 h2 h3 h4 ...), each of which was rendered with an id attribute. For each heading Hugo adds a li item in TOC at appropriate level. <aside class="aside-pane right-pane"> <header> <h2> <i class="fas fa-list"></i> <span>CONENTS</span> </h2> </header> <nav id="TableOfContents"> <ul> <!
